html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-01122023-02-10ISI, CB
ActCopyright Act
SubjectCopyright Board Rules of Practice and Procedure
PrecisCOPYRIGHT BOARD RULES OF PRACTICE AND PROCEDURE in order to (1) sequence the tariff-setting process at the Board to respect the Time Limits in Respect of Matters Before the Copyright Board Regulations; (2) establish clearer rules and practices to address the timeliness, efficiency, predictability, and transparency of Board procedures; and (3) provide clearer guidance to parties on how to engage with the Board and establish specific requirements for their participation in tariff-setting proceedings.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2023-0024 Publication Date: 2023-03-01
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Copyright Board Rules of Practice and Procedure
precis: COPYRIGHT BOARD RULES OF PRACTICE AND PROCEDURE in order to (1) sequence the tariff-setting process at the Board to respect the Time Limits in Respect of Matters Before the Copyright Board Regulations; (2) establish clearer rules and practices to address the timeliness, efficiency, predictability, and transparency of Board procedures; and (3) provide clearer guidance to parties on how to engage with the Board and establish specific requirements for their participation in tariff-setting proceedings.
